meanings.definition: Decorative details added to enhance the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The Christmas tree was adorned with beautiful embellishments.
meanings.sent2: She sewed intricate embellishments onto the dress to make it more elegant.
meanings.sent3: The cake was covered in so many embellishments that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was filled with embellishments that made it sparkle like a diamond.
meanings.sent5: The garden was transformed by the colorful embellishments scattered throughout.

meanings.definition: Exaggerated or elaborate additions to a story or account.
meanings.sent1: His tall tales were full of wild embellishments to make them more exciting.
meanings.sent2: The historical account was filled with unnecessary embellishments to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent3: The fisherman's story had so many embellishments that it was hard to separate fact from fiction.
meanings.sent4: Her excuse for being late was an embellishment of the truth to avoid trouble.
meanings.sent5: The movie script was a masterpiece of embellishments, making the plot twist even more surprising.
